ComicInfo.Title: TPB
ComicInfo.Summary:
Demonslayer is the story of Jaclyn Hayes, an archaeologist from Boston whose trek to Tibet ended in disaster. Saved from certain death by a group of enigmatic monks who took her arrival as the fulfillment of an ancient prophecy, Jaclyn was trained to the limit in both mind and body and sent out into the world once again — as the Demonslayer!
The entire pre-Avatar Demonslayer saga is now available in one volume! Collected within are all six of the original Demonslayer issues that were published by Image comics as well as the ultra-rare issue #0 in one mammoth 160 page volume! The start of Marat Mychaels' breakout series is not to be missed, from her origin and boyfriend Michael getting turned into a demon, tot he breach of Hell itself, all the early defining moments of this series are now available in this trade paperback.
Originally published in (Image/Next) Demonslayer #0, vol 1 #1-3 and vol 2 (Into Hell) #1-3
Credits list a "colorist" but this trade paperback edition is presented in glorious greyscale.
Available in "regular" edition and limited edition white leather.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-10-06 22:26:54. [CVDB456465]
ComicInfo.Inker: Erik Reeves, Jaime Mendoza, Marat Mychaels, Pierre-Andre Dery, Robert Jones, Serge LaPointe
